name: Inmersa ERP
short_description:
This is an ERP system developed in php on a startup called Inmersa. The last efforts conducted in that startup before going south was towards exporting the objects, developed on php,  through xml-rpc so they could be consumed by a more modern gui (ruby on rails). 

The key functionality on the system is it's:
- management of wherehouse's stock, through a picking-device to be used during the in/out process at the wherehouse. 
- Very extensive relational database, with many options for comercial offers and discounts. 
- Distribution management for handling the moneis collected on the manifests.
summary: ERP Specialized on Distribution with Wherehouse Controll
